overview_of_class: This course concerns key theoretical issues relating to colonialism and decolonization, and situates these discussions in case studies from the Muslim world. The first segment concerns the process of colonialism and its effect on articulations of cultural difference, gender, ethnicity, and religion. The second portion looks at decolonization and liberation struggles. The last portion considers the long-term effects of colonialism (neo-colonialism?) persisting perhaps beyond independence.
